page.p: On the road to Millbrook, the party encounters a group of goblins led by a scout.
The entrance is guarded by goblins.
Snarltooth, a bugbear, leads the goblins from this chamber. He has taken Marcus Thornwood prisoner.
Snarltooth wears a tattered cloak and wields a morningstar. He is accompanied by his pet wolf, Fang.
page.stat_block: BUGBEAR Medium humanoid (goblinoid), chaotic evil Armor Class 16 (hide armor, shield) Hit Points 27 (5d8 + 5) Challenge 1 (200 XP)

page.p: Erik Stoneheart is a human fighter and member of the merchant guild. He was escorting Marcus Thornwood to Millbrook when they were ambushed by goblins. Erik knows that Marcus was taken to the mill but doesn't know the full layout.
page.stat_block: HUMAN FIGHTER Medium humanoid (human), lawful good Armor Class 17 (chain mail) Hit Points 32 (5d8 + 10) Challenge 2 (450 XP)
